name: HR Analytics Summit
content: www.hranalyticssummit.com The HR Analytics Summit will feature Senior HR Leaders looking specifically at Data-led HR Transformation and People Analytics to be held on 11th May in Central London. Typically workforce costs represent roughly a third of all company operational costs (hiring, training, attrition etc...) yet HR Analytics represents less than 5% of Analytics investment - this represents a huge waste of efficiency and the loss of competitive advantage. HR is evolving, deeper insights and a stronger connection between the workforce and the business put the HR Leaders in the perfect position to drive effective and measurable change throughout the business. The event will feature: - An end-user driven agenda featuring up to the minute topics - Engagement, diversity, metrics, culture, The future of AI within HR, Data-led HR Transformation and many more will be discussed through a mix of keynote and panel sessions - Most HR Leaders cannot take multiple days out of the office. The HR Analytics Summit is designed to cover a wide range of topics, in detail with brand new real-life implementation focussed case studies as well as 5 hours of networking discussion time - All in one intensive day! - We handpick and strictly limit the number of sponsors at the event - meaning you will meet only truly innovative and credible partners without being swarmed by salespeople. Our event operates on a 5:1 ratio of end-users to sponsors and features both formal (through coffee, breakfast and lunch) and informal networking (through Happy Hour drinks). - Industry-leading speakers from worldwide brands: Facebook, Lloyds Bank, Nestle, Vodafone, Shell, Standard Chartered, Philip Morris International, RSA Group, LEGO, Skanska and Virgin Atlantic.
